desc: This method is used to invite a user to a private group. The calling user must be a member of the group.

channel.desc: Private group to invite user to.

errors.channel_not_found: Value passed for channel was invalid.
errors.user_not_found: Value passed for user was invalid.
errors.cant_invite_self: Authenticated user cannot invite themselves to a group.
errors.cant_invite: User cannot be invited to this group.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
errors.user_is_ultra_restricted: This method cannot be called by a single channel guest.
